name: Creature Keeper(itch)
description:
A game where you have to look after a strange creature.
Made for Ludum Dare 46.Timelapse
Credits
Game made using GameMaker Studio 2Graphics made using AsepriteSound Effects made using Bfxr
Fonts
Retron 2000 by Daymarius (https://www.dafont.com/retron2000.font)8 Bit Wonder by Joiro Hatgaya (https://www.dafont.com/8bit-wonder.font)
Audio
Rescue from PlayOnLoop.com (https://www.playonloop.com)Finger Tap by pikachu09 (https://freesound.org/people/pikachu09/sounds/204605/)Dog Grumble by qubodup (https://opengameart.org/content/dog-snarl-grunt-grumble)
